Although the company began quietly testing a new streaming service titled Redbox Digital last week, the service is in its early stages and is not open to the public.
Redbox partnered with Verizon to launch a streaming service in 2013, but it failed to gain significant traction and was shut down the following year.
Outerwall has estimated it would close as many 2,000 Redbox kiosks during 2016.
It had 40,480 kiosks as of Dec. 31.
